revision.text:
{{codepointer|Classic attack}}'''A_SkelMissile''' {{doomwiki|A_SkelMissile}}
(no parameters)
The missile attack of Doom's [[Classes:Revenant|Revenant]]. This shoots a [[Classes:RevenantTracer|RevenantTracer]] missile. The spawn height for the missile is 8 units higher than the default.
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's Revenant.
Missile: SKEL J 0 bright [[A_FaceTarget]] SKEL J 10 bright [[A_FaceTarget]] SKEL K 10 [[A_SkelMissile]] // See [[Classes:RevenantTracer|RevenantTracer]] SKEL K 10 [[A_FaceTarget]] goto See
